messages.message: Yea, I'm thinking as an easy change, we can have it return the actual error message instead of ERROR (it seems like only logging checks for the presence of `ERROR` exactly, so I can just update that).
alternatively, I can add an `error_msg` field to RefinedPhrase, and keep the behavior of text the same
@shaunak this is something that we would like fixed for Feb 3, so do you have recommendations on which path to go? i think making an ibocr change would warrant more thought/review
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LNzgqiP6gnN0QNWDxqwt_xt7FKaQ4JtRcZiRMycZFRo/edit feel free to drop in thoughts there
